I arrived at Aroma quite late, so the remaining pastries weren't very diverse, but they were surprisingly delicious. I bought a regular croissant and a garlic butter croissant. reconstructed_comment:
- Khi bước vào cửa, bạn sẽ cảm nhận được mùi bơ thơm thoang thoảng. Có hai khu vực bánh: một ở quầy bên trái ngay khi vừa bước vào và một ở quầy tính tiền.

- Có chỗ ngồi lại (khoảng 3 ghế sofa) và có phục vụ cả nước uống, nhưng tôi không nghĩ quán phù hợp để ngồi lại lâu. Chủ yếu là để mua mang đi.

eng_comment:
- When you step inside, you'll notice a faint buttery aroma. There are two pastry areas: one at the counter on the left as soon as you enter and another at the checkout counter.
- The pastries are fragrant, crispy, and evenly coated with salted egg yolk sauce. I bought directly from the shop, so the staff warmed up the pastries before handing them to me.
- The roll croissants here are very popular, so you need to order in advance. On the day I visited, there were extra pistachio ones, so I was able to buy them immediately. The staff only fill the pastries with cream when you're ready to eat.
- The pastries have a lot of creamy filling, which is rich, but I don't think pistachio suits my taste.
- There is seating available (about 3 sofas) and they also serve drinks, but I don't think the shop is suitable for a long stay. It's mainly for takeout.
- The owner and the staff are very friendly.
- You can park in front of the shop and lock your bike yourself as there is no security.
- Overall, it was a pretty decent experience for me.

org_comment: Hơi thất vọng nhẹ chút. Ngày 5/11 mình thấy trên fb nên ra tiệm mua 1 hộp ăn rất ngon, nhân đầy ụ. Thấy ngon quá tuần sau ngày 10/11 tới mua thì bị thất vọng. reconstructed_comment: Hơi thất vọng một chút. Ngày 5/11, mình thấy trên Facebook có quảng cáo nên ra tiệm mua một hộp bánh, ăn rất ngon, nhân đầy ụ. Thấy ngon quá nên tuần sau, ngày 10/11, mình tới mua thì bị thất vọng. Bánh khô hơn, nhân ít đi hẳn. Không biết tại sao lại bị đổi công thức hay do bánh quá hot nên các bạn nhân viên làm không xuể khiến chất lượng không đồng đều. Buồn vì trải nghiệm lần đầu rất tốt mà lần sau không ổn lắm.
eng_comment: A bit disappointed. On November 5th, I saw an advertisement on Facebook, so I went to the store to buy a box of cakes, which were very delicious and filled with lots of filling. They were so good that the following week, on November 10th, I went to buy them again but was disappointed. The cakes were drier, and the filling was significantly less. I don't know if the recipe was changed or if the cakes were too popular, causing the staff to be overwhelmed and resulting in inconsistent quality. It's sad because the first experience was very good, but the next time wasn't as great.
